#summary Our application to Google Summer of Code

== Introduction ==

This page contains the text of our application to the
[http://code.google.com/soc/2008/ Google Summer of Code] program.  For more
information on Google Summer of Code, see the
[http://code.google.com/soc/2008/faqs.html FAQ] page.  Of particular interest
is the
[http://groups.google.com/group/google-summer-of-code-announce/web/notes-on-organization-selection-criteria Notes on Organization Selection Criteria] page.
